<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/modifiers/{modifierId}/groups/{groupId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



This creates a new AreaDeviceNodeGroupingEntity link to a Modifier

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}

>
  
</RequestSchema>
